alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, north central Leon, southeastern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Havana, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havana, Midway, Tallahassee, Attapulgus, Freemont, Littman, Darsey, Florence, Concord, Scotland, Orchard Pond, Jamieson, Gibson, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Laingkat, Calvary, Shady Rest, Fowlstown, Amsterdam and Quincy Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
